title: Effects of Atrial Fibrillation Ablation for Heart Failure With Preserved Ejection Fraction: Insights From CABANA
details: P Martens, SN Augusto Jr, J Erzeel, L Pison, W Mullens… - JACC: Heart Failure, 2025
abstract: Background Atrial fibrillation (AF) ablation is Class I recommendation in selected heart failure (HF) patients with reduced ejection fraction; less is known in heart failure with preserved ejection fraction (HFpEF). Objectives The aim of this study was to …
